Animator - Class in ta.shape3D
This class run continually to modify objects which implements the interface Animable regurarly
Animator(int) - Constructor for class ta.shape3D.Animator
Initialize the lists and define the interval between each animation
Animator.Animable - Interface in ta.shape3D
Implement this class for animate object by using Animator
Animator.TemporarilyAnimable - Interface in ta.shape3D
Derived from animable, this interface allows moreover object to be stopped by the Animator
anime() - Method in interface ta.shape3D.Animator.Animable
Method which is called by the animator to modify the object
anime() - Method in class ta.shape3D.mesh.MeshTA
The implementation of the Anime interface, animate the mesh with the animation features defined with animationTX(), animationTY(), animationTZ(), animationRX(), animationRY() and animationRZ()
arret() - Method in class ta.shape3D.Animator
stop the animation and interrupt the Thread
